parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. To obtain the application ID, call the ListApplications operation.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.description: The list of data files that you want to distribute. The value must be a JSON string.

parameters.name: DistStrategy
parameters.description: The canary release policy. The value must be a JSON string. You can specify multiple distribution policies. By default, all data files are distributed.
